ygData.subject: OT-High Speed Access
ygData.msgSnippet: Pardon for this being non-Bard oriented question (I forget the terminology between META and OT - so forgive this as well) but given the level of knowledge on
ygData.messageBody:
Pardon for this being non-Bard oriented question (I forget the terminology between META and OT - so forgive this as well) but given the level of knowledge on this board - I wanted to ask it here..

I just signed up for DSL Access and hopefully will have 1.024 MBs access in about five weeks. Two questions

1) Will I see any advantages in EQ? I would assume lag should be less of an issue and zoning a bit faster...

2) The service I've signed up for eventually will charge $20/GB upstream after the first GB (i.e. the first Gigabyte is free) any idea how much data EQ is pumping upstream?

Thanks

Slyde of Xegony
Dan Sniderman
